contractAddress="0x8aee617cef1919451ab81f92ecf7077f84da1a26";// 替换为您的合约地址
function App(){const{t,i18n}=useTranslation();const[web3,setWeb3]=useState(null);const[contract,setContract]=useState(null);const[account,setAccount]=useState("");const[isLoggedIn,setIsLoggedIn]=useState(false);const[currentPage,setCurrentPage]=useState("market");const[txEvents,setTxEvents]=useState([]);const[balance,setBalance]=useState("0.00 ETH");const[userAvatar,setUserAvatar]=useState(localStorage.getItem("userAvatar")||"/images/default-avatar.png");const[showUserMenu,setShowUserMenu]=useState(false);const[theme,setTheme]=useState("light");// 1) init Web3 + contract + account + balance
useEffect(()=>{if(!window.ethereum)return;const w3=new Web3(window.ethereum);setWeb3(w3);(async()=>{try{await window.ethereum.request({method:"eth_requestAccounts"});const[acct]=await w3.eth.getAccounts();setAccount(acct);setIsLoggedIn(true);const bal=await w3.eth.getBalance(acct);setBalance(w3.utils.fromWei(bal,"ether")+" ETH");setContract(new w3.eth.Contract(contractABI,contractAddress));}catch(err){console.error(err);}})();},[]);// 2) fetch all past events once
useEffect(()=>{if(!contract)return;contract.getPastEvents("allEvents",{fromBlock:0,toBlock:"latest"}).then(events=>setTxEvents(events.reverse())).catch(console.error);},[contract]);// avatar upload handler
const handleAvatarUpload=e=>{const file=e.target.files[0];if(!file)return;const reader=new FileReader();reader.onload=ev=>{setUserAvatar(ev.target.result);localStorage.setItem("userAvatar",ev.target.result);};reader.readAsDataURL(file);};// theme toggle
const toggleTheme=()=>setTheme(t=>t==="dark"?"light":"dark");// language toggle
const toggleLanguage=()=>i18n.changeLanguage(i18n.language==="en"?"zh":"en");// logout
const handleLogout=()=>{setIsLoggedIn(false);setAccount("");setBalance("0.00 ETH");setShowUserMenu(false);};if(!isLoggedIn){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-container theme-{theme}",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:t("welcome")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>window.ethereum.request({method:"eth_requestAccounts"}),children:t("login_with_metamask")})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`app-container theme-${theme}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"app-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:userAvatar,alt:"Avatar",className:"user-avatar",onClick:()=>setShowUserMenu(v=>!v)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"user-balance",children:balance}),showUserMenu&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"avatar-upload",type:"file",accept:"image/*",onChange:handleAvatarUpload,className:"avatar-upload"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"avatar-upload",className:"avatar-upload-label",children:t("upload_avatar")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,children:t("logout")})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"theme-toggle",onClick:toggleTheme,children:theme==="dark"?t("light_mode"):t("dark_mode")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"language-toggle",onClick:toggleLanguage,children:i18n.language==="en"?"中文":"English"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"app-sidebar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setCurrentPage("market"),className:currentPage==="market"?"active":"",children:t("market")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setCurrentPage("inventory"),className:currentPage==="inventory"?"active":"",children:t("inventory")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setCurrentPage("transaction_history"),className:currentPage==="transaction_history"?"active":"",children:t("transaction_history")})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"app-content",children:[currentPage==="market"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Market,{contract:contract,account:account,web3:web3,theme:theme}),currentPage==="inventory"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Inventory,{contract:contract,account:account,web3:web3,theme:theme}),currentPage==="transaction_history"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"market-with-history",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Market,{contract:contract,account:account,web3:web3,theme:theme}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TransactionHistory,{events:txEvents})]})]})]})]});}export default App;
